title: Systematic CXR Intepretation
description: You need to look systematically at the CXR. ABCDE is a useful pneumonic to use

sections.title: Deviated Trachea
sections.descirption: A deviated trachea can indicate .... etc

sections.title: Lung fields
sections.descirption: Shadowing in right middle lobe suggests .... etc

sections.title: Enlarged heart
sections.descirption: Increased cardiothoracic ratio is seen in .... etc

sections.title: Diaphragm
sections.descirption: blunt costrophrenic angles may suggest .... etc

sections.title: ECG leads
sections.descirption: Extra features hint at level of morbidity .... etc
